## Purpose

The purpose of this script is to take the file output of CellProfiler and figure out which rescues worked

## Packages

```{r packages}
CRANpackages <- c("tidyverse", "ggplot2","gghighlight","ggpubr")

# CRANpackages <- c("tidyverse", "ggplot2", "ggpubr", "ggstats","BiocManager","viridis","gghighlight", "ggrepel")
biocPackages <- c()

for(i in CRANpackages){
  if(!(i %in% rownames(installed.packages()))){
    install.packages(pkgs = i)
  }
  library(package = i, character.only = T, quietly = T)
  rm(i)
}

for(i in biocPackages){
  if(!(i %in% rownames(installed.packages()))){
    BiocManager::install(pkgs = i, ask = F)
  }
  library(package = i, character.only = T, quietly = T)
  rm(i)
}

rm(CRANpackages,biocPackages)

```

## Data
```{r data}
setwd("/Users/irika/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-JohnsHopkins/WongLing/Scripts/250325_NMDi")
cryptic_df <- read_delim("output_tables/250506_CrypticCoordinates_Fill.csv")
scores_df <- read_delim("data/240924_YY_rescue.csv")

# Filter knockdown genes to those kept in final CE dictionary
oddKD <- unique(scores_df$gene)[which(!(unique(scores_df$gene) %in% c(cryptic_df$`Gene Symbol`, "GFP","shCTR")))]
scores_df <- scores_df %>%  filter(!(gene %in% c("TCF25")))

```

## Normalize scores to shCTR-GFP and shTDP43-GFP
```{r norm}
# Normalize survival
# 0 = shTDP43-GFP
# 1 = shCTR-GFP

scores_df$survival = as.numeric(scores_df$survival)
df_summary <- scores_df %>% group_by(gene) %>% summarize(med = median(survival)) %>% arrange(med)

minVal = df_summary$med[which(df_summary$gene == "GFP")]
maxVal = df_summary$med[which(df_summary$gene == "shCTR")]

scores_df$Norm = round((scores_df$survival - minVal)/(maxVal-minVal),3)


```



## Visualize
```{r visual}
# generate colors
pal <- scales::gradient_n_pal(colours = c("#820000","white","#002D72"), values= c(0, 0.253,0.5))
df_summary$fillColor <- pal(df_summary$med)
df_summary$fillColor[which(df_summary$gene == "GFP")] = "#820000"
order = df_summary$gene

scores_df %>% mutate(gene = factor(gene, levels = order)) %>%
  filter(gene != "shCTR")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=gene,y=Norm, fill = gene)) +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.5, width=0.2, size=1.5, color="black")+
  geom_boxplot(alpha=0.7, outliers = F) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values=df_summary$fillColor) +
  theme_classic()+ scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0),limits = c(-0.3,0.7))+
  theme(text = element_text(color="black", family = "Helvetica", size=15),
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust=1), legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("")+ylab("Survival")+
  stat_compare_means(label = "p.signif", method = "wilcox.test", ref.group = "GFP")

ggsave("output_fig/250506_shRNA_toxicity.png",device = "png", 
       width = 50, height = 20, units = "cm",limitsize = FALSE)

# Calculate p-values of difference from control using Wilcox test - not normalized
df_stats <- compare_means(formula= Norm ~ gene, data=scores_df, ref.group = "GFP", method = "wilcox.test")


```
